document.full_text: tears streaming from her eyes, barry bonds' former personal shopper became the first and only one of the government's 23 witnesses at his federal trial to say she saw the all-time home run leader getting an injection from his trainer.
document.title: former aide says she saw trainer inject bonds
lines_and_colors: tears streaming from her eyes, barry bonds' former personal shopper became the first and only one of the government's 23 witnesses at his federal trial to say she saw the all-time home run leader getting an injection from his trainer.
